docs.lead_paragraph: Gov. Patrick J. Quinn is scheduled to sign a bill that will allow doctors and dentists licensed in other states volunteer their services in Illinois without needing state authorization.
docs.snippet: Gov. Patrick J. Quinn is scheduled to sign a bill that will allow doctors and dentists licensed in other states volunteer their services in Illinois without needing state authorization.

docs.lead_paragraph: With President Obama’s successful move to force BP to establish a $20 billion fund, he has reinvigorated a debate about the reach of government power.

headline.sub: BP is Latest Example of Tactic by Obama;

docs.snippet: With President Obama’s successful move to force BP to establish a $20 billion fund, he has reinvigorated a debate about the reach of government power.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Justice Department has asked a federal judge to dismiss a lawsuit by 20 states challenging President Obama’s health care overhaul.

docs.lead_paragraph: The European Union’s move is aimed at restoring confidence in the health of the bloc’s financial sector, but the agreement covers only the top 25 banks.

byline.contributor:
Stephen Castle reported from
Brussels, and Jack Ewing from
Frankfurt. James Kanter contributed
reporting from Brussels.
byline.original: By STEPHEN CASTLE and JACK EWING

headline.main: Will Premiums Be Higher for Adult Children?

docs.abstract: Employers and insurers will not be permitted to charge more for older dependents than for younger ones, but some employers may charge for each additional person added to a plan.
docs.snippet: Employers and insurers will not be permitted to charge more for older dependents than for younger ones, but some employers may charge for each additional person added to a plan.

docs.lead_paragraph: Last weekend, City Room published a variation of the quiz that investigators give to some citizens and their foreign spouses to try to determine if the marriages are shams. It provoked a mix of dissension, delight and personal revelations from nearly 100 readers, including Larry Eisenberg, who -- as will be familiar to regular visitors to our comment section -- responded in verse:

headline.main: Readers Put Their Marriages Up to the Test

docs.abstract: A mock quiz for citizens and their foreign spouses prompts a mix of dissension, delight and personal revelations.
